charges.charge_disposition: The Defendant Plead Guilty to Count 1 on 3/23/05 of The Indictment. Court Imposes The Following Sentence to Count 1: 48 Months Custody of US Bop. 3 Years Supervised With Special Conditions. no Fine. $100.00 Msa. no Restitution. Defendant Advised of Right to Appeal. Amended Judgment And Commitment - Date of Offense Concluded Amended to 08/07/2004 - Dft Pleaded Guilty to Count 1 on 03/23/2005. Dft Committed to Custody of Bop For 48 Months on Count 1. Supervised Release For 3 Years on Count 1. no Fine or Restitution, Total Assessment $100.00.
